home.title: Hi! I'm Colton
home.description: I'm a 24-year-old full-stack software developer living in Raleigh, NC. I take pride in designing and building attractive websites and applications, with an emphasis on engaging experiences. Take a look through my blog or read through my portfolio to learn more. Feel free to reach out to me for more information, as well!
